item.title: Creative coding
item.description: Creative coding Introduction My research imperatives run along the threads of transmediation, intersemiotic translation, post-disciplinarity (interdisciplinarity, multidiscplinarity) and the general concerns of Human Computer Interaction (HCI). Key words: big-data, connectivity, interdisciplinarity, interconnection, machine learning, multidisciplinarity, real-time, sonification,streaming, visualisation, web Science and art Biology and sound/music "The L-Systems, also known as Lindenmayer Systems, are a class of algorithms for the production of structures based on recursive rewriting rules.
